Posts.Content: Dec 31, 2007 11:40PM happy wrote: Hi, Kelie. I am sorry that you have to keep chasing answers. Have you had a PET scan? Has anyone suggested a breast MRI? Do you have pain anywhere else? Back, shoulders, etc? Mamogram and ultrasounds may not be sophisticated enough for proper diagnosis. Please keep looking for answers!
Posts.Title: Not sure what my next step is Kellie Kellie
